title: Addtional funding for LMC development for ExoMars (period 01 Dec 2010 to 31 Mar 2011)
abstractText: See previous documents / proposals submitted to Sue Horne of STFC The proposal is for additional equipment items to support LMC assay development up to 31st March 2011
impactText: See submission for ST/F003900/1 as suggested by Ian Fuller / EVALUATION@stfc.ac.uk
